Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Match

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<MoveResponse>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Match
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MatchMulti, MatchSolo
public abstract class Match
extends Observable<MoveResponse>
implements java.io.Serializable
Abstract class containing the attributes and the methods shared by MatchSolo and MatchMulti
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • getDevelopmentCardOnTop

      public DevelopmentCard getDevelopmentCardOnTop​(DevelopmentCardType type, DevelopmentCardLevel level)
      Method to get the top DevelopmentCard of a Stack (combination of DevelopmentCardLevel and DevelopmentCardType)
      Parameters:
      type - DevelopmentCardType can be GREEN, BLUE, YELLOW,PURPLE
      level - DevelopmentCardLevel can be 1,2,3
      Returns:
      The top DevelopmentCard of the Stack

      public java.util.ArrayList<Resource> getPendingMarketResources()
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Resource containing all the Resource pending from a move in the MarketBoard

      Returns:
      ArrayList of Resource containing all the Resource pending from a move

    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer​(Player newPlayer)
      Method used to add a player in the match, if the match is full the method will return false and also if a Player with that username is already present
      Parameters:
      newPlayer - the Player to be added to the ArrayList
      Returns:
      true if the Player is correctly added, false if the ArrayList is already full or some error occur

    • setWhoAmI

      public void setWhoAmI​(int whoAmI)

    • pickDevelopmentCardOnTop

      public DevelopmentCard pickDevelopmentCardOnTop​(DevelopmentCardType type, DevelopmentCardLevel level)
      Method to pick (get and remove) the top DevelopmentCard of a Stack (combination of DevelopmentCardLevel and DevelopmentCardType)
      Parameters:
      type - DevelopmentCardType can be GREEN, BLUE, YELLOW,PURPLE
      level - DevelopmentCardLevel can be 1,2,3
      Returns:
      The top DevelopmentCard of the Stack

    • discardTwoLeaderCardInteraction

      public void discardTwoLeaderCardInteraction​(int posFirst, int posSecond, Player player, ResourceType resourceTypeFirst, ResourceType resourceTypeSecond)
      Method to discard 2 LeaderCard when a Match starts
      Parameters:
      posFirst - index of the first LeaderCard to discard
      posSecond - index of the second LeaderCard to discard
      player - that is discarding the 2 cards
      resourceTypeFirst - ResourceType that a Player can choose, based on the order of the turn
      resourceTypeSecond - ResourceType that a Player can choose, based on the order of the turn

    • discardLeaderCardInteraction

      public void discardLeaderCardInteraction​(int leaderCardPosition, Player player, boolean noControl)
      Method to discard a LeaderCard
      Parameters:
      leaderCardPosition - index of the LeaderCard to discard
      player - Player who is discarding the LeaderCard

    • enableLeaderCardInteraction

      public void enableLeaderCardInteraction​(int leaderCardPosition, Player player, boolean noControl)
      Method to enable a LeaderCard
      Parameters:
      leaderCardPosition - index of the LeaderCard to enable
      player - Player who is discarding the LeaderCard

    • askForMove

      public void askForMove()
      Method to ask to Player which move wants to play

    • marketInteraction

      public void marketInteraction​(MoveType moveType, int pos, Player player, boolean noControl)
      Method used to perform a MarketInteractionPlayerMove to let the Player to gain Resource from the MarketBoard the resources gained are placed into pendingResources ArrayList
      Parameters:
      moveType - MoveType can be ROW / COLUMN
      pos - which ROW/COLUMN to select
      player - the Player performing the interaction

    • marketMarbleConvertInteraction

      public void marketMarbleConvertInteraction​(int first, int second, Player player, boolean noControl)
      Method used to perform the conversion of the white marbles, the Resource gained are placed into pendingResources ArrayList

    • positioningResourcesInteraction

      public void positioningResourcesInteraction​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> whereToPlace, Player player, boolean noControl)
      Method used by the Player to place Resource inside of Warehouse If anything goes well the pendingResources ArrayList will be empty and the Resource which were inside of it will be stored inside Warehouse
      Parameters:
      whereToPlace - an ArrayList containing where to add (in which Warehouse) the iTH Resource of the pendingResources
      player - the Player performing the action

    • buyDevelopmentCardInteraction

      public void buyDevelopmentCardInteraction​(DevelopmentCardType type, DevelopmentCardLevel level, Player player, int posToAdd, java.util.ArrayList<ResourcePick> resourceToUse, boolean noControl)
      Method used to perform the user's purchase of a DevelopmentCard
      Parameters:
      type - the DevelopmentCardType which specifies which column of the DevelopmentCard Stack needs to be selected
      level - the DevelopmentCardLevel which specifies which row of the DevelopmentCard Stack needs to be selected
      player - the Player which call the Move
      posToAdd - the int that specify in which user's DevelopmentCardSpace the new DevelopmentCard has to be placed into

    • activateProductivePower

      public void activateProductivePower​(ProductivePower power, java.util.ArrayList<ResourcePick> resourceToUse, Player player, boolean noControl)
      Activate the productive Power
      Parameters:
      power - that the Player wants to activate
      resourceToUse - ArrayList of ResourcePick to indicate where Player pick the Resource
      player - Player that activates the Productive Power
      noControl - boolean value if the method needs to control the input

    • enableProductionBaseInteraction

      public void enableProductionBaseInteraction​(java.util.ArrayList<ResourcePick> resourceToUse, ResourceType toType, Player player, boolean noControl)
      Method used to perform the enable of the base interaction
      Parameters:
      resourceToUse - ArrayList of ResourcePick to indicate where Player pick the Resource
      toType - ResourceType to convert the 2 Resource
      player - Player that activates the Base Productive Power

    • enableProductionDevelopmentInteraction

      public void enableProductionDevelopmentInteraction​(java.util.ArrayList<ResourcePick> resourceToUse, int positionOfDevelopmentCard, Player player, boolean noControl)
      Method used to perform the enable of the development interaction
      Parameters:
      resourceToUse - ArrayList of ResourcePick to indicate where Player pick the Resource
      positionOfDevelopmentCard - index to indicate where is the DevelopmentCard
      player - Player that activates the interaction

    • enableProductionLeaderInteraction

      public void enableProductionLeaderInteraction​(java.util.ArrayList<ResourcePick> resourceToUse, int positionOfProductivePower, ResourceType resourceType, Player player, boolean noControl)
      Method used to perform the enable of the production interaction
      Parameters:
      resourceToUse - ArrayList of ResourcePick to indicate where Player pick the Resource
      positionOfProductivePower - index to indicate which Productive Power Player wants to activate
      player - Player that activates the interaction

    • MoveResourcesInteraction

      public void MoveResourcesInteraction​(int indexFirstWarehouse, int indexSecondWarehouse, int how_may_first, int how_many_second, Player player, boolean noControl)
      Method used by the Player to swap Resource between two Warehouse
      Parameters:
      indexFirstWarehouse - an int representing the first Warehouse
      indexSecondWarehouse - an int representing the second Warehouse
      player - the Player that is performing the action

    • endRoundInteraction

      public void endRoundInteraction​(Player player, boolean noControl)
      Method to manage the end of the turn. All the Resource pending are store in the strongbox
      Parameters:
      player - the Player that is ending the turn

    • controlPopePath

      public void controlPopePath()
      Method used at the end of any movements of a Player to check if someone has is in the activation zone of a Pope's Tale. 8 -> Pope's Tale 1 of 2 point 16 -> Pope's Tale 2 of 3 point 24 -> Pope's Tale 3 of 4 point

    • whoIsWinner

      public java.util.ArrayList<Winner> whoIsWinner()
      If 2 or more Player has the same amount of points, the winner will be the one with more Resource. If more Player have the same amount of the Resource they will be Winners
      Returns:
      the ArrayList of the winner/s

      Parameters:
      playerName - name of the Player to disconnect
      noControl - boolean parameter to indicate if a control of the input is needed

      public void skipTurn​(Player player, boolean noControl)
      Method to skip the turn of a Player. Used when a Player is disconnected
      Parameters:
      player - Player to skip the turn
      noControl - boolean parameter to indicate if a control of the input is needed
